body.p: This section of the site contains a number of documents that describe the inner workings of the Simal project. These are technical documents and are therefore intended for technical readers. The intention is to provide a starting point to new developers wanting to find their way around in the code.
These notes are intended to capture the current and past state of our implementation. Together they will provide an insight into the current design and the decisions we made to get here.

These are evolving documents that contain fairly rough notes made by developers during their hacking. Often they will refer to mailing list archives where more information can be found. Detail is usually added by those who come later, that is, those trying to understand their content in a bid to understand the current implementation. So, if you find yourself reading a section with lots of information hidden away in mail archives it would be great to have you summarise that information as part of your research work.
This is a great way make an early contribution to Simal and to pave the way for those who come after you.
